EmailTemplate.name: re-establish your membership
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Recent Application with ICCU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thank you for your online application to re-establish your membership with Idaho Central Credit Union. Unfortunately we are unable to process your request online. In order to re-establish your membership, please apply at your local branch with a Financial Services Officer. I apologize for the inconvenience. If you have questions, please feel free to contact us at 1-800-456-5067 using reference number <CollabJob>.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Idaho Central Credit Union
P.O. Box 2469
Pocatello, ID 83206
d: (208) 239-3000 | f: (208) 239-3055
